title: Let's Get Cookin'
description: A place for beginners and aspiring chefs to hone their craft.

home.title: Let's Get Cookin
home.description: Welcome! Listen. Let's be real. This site won't turn you into the next iron chef. But hopefully, we can make sure the next time you make pasta, it isn't still crunchy. Unless that's how you like it, but that's a whole different issue... :)
